tool_description: The MusicBrainz API provides access to a large repository of music metadata, including artist, album, and recording details.
title: MusicBrainz API

api_list.name: artist_search
api_list.description: Allows searching for artists by name.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The search query to find the artist.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to skip.

required_parameters.name: mbid
required_parameters.description: The MusicBrainz Identifier for the release.

optional_parameters.name: inc
optional_parameters.description: Include additional information such as artists or recordings.

api_list.name: release_group_browse
api_list.description: Browse release groups by artist MBID.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of results to skip.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Filter release groups by type (album, single, etc.).
